headline: VARIAN TURBO PUMP 75 L/S
keywords: turbomolecular pump turbo pumps turbos drag pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Turbo Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model V-80A
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 75.0 l/s (158.9 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 4.00E-9(En) torr (5.33E-9 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 63.0 mm (2.480 in)
Foreline Flange KF 16.0 mm (0.630 in)
Duty--Service Normal
Inlet Screen Included Yes
Installation Orientation Any
Rotational Speed 60,000 RPM
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Other Information Air or water cooling
Bakeout temperature 120°C at inlet flange
Emergency vent valve Model 9699832
Exterior Dimensions
Width 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Height 7.300 in (18.5 cm)
